trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of static <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects, which is used when the connections are declared in content pages and the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control is declared in a master page.
trans-unit.target: 包含集合的靜態<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>連線在內容頁面中宣告時使用的物件和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref>控制項在主版頁面中宣告。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection class is used in a specific development scenario.
trans-unit.target: ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection 類別用於特定開發案例。

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts application uses master pages, with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control declared in a master page, and individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects declared in content pages as static connections, the ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection class is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Web 組件的應用程式會使用主版頁面<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項在主版頁面中，宣告和個別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件宣告在內容頁面中為靜態連接，ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection 類別用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: In the content pages, multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> controls can be declared, which differs from the ordinary rule that only one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control can be declared on a page.
trans-unit.target: 在內容頁中，多個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>控制項可以宣告，這不同於一般的規則只有一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項可以在網頁上宣告。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control on a content page can contain a `<StaticConnections>` element, and this element can contain one or more declared `<asp:webpartconnection>` elements.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>內容頁面上的控制項可以包含`<StaticConnections>`項目和這個項目可以包含一或多個宣告`<asp:webpartconnection>`項目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection class is used by the Web Parts control set to create a collection of all the static connections declared in each content page, and these collections are ultimately added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> collection in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection 類別會使用 Web 組件控制項設定為建立每個內容的頁面中宣告的靜態連接的集合，而且最終會加入這些集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection class is used to create the collection of static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects that is referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection 類別用來建立集合的靜態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>所參考的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager>控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager.StaticConnections%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to add new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects to an existing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 用以加入新的 Add 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件到現有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>来加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that indicates where the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> was inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 整數值，指出的位置<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>插入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否為特定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>物件存在於集合中。

trans-unit.source: The Contains method enables you to check a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object and determine whether it is in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Contains 方法可讓您檢查特定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件，並判斷它是否在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> being checked for its existence in a collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>正在檢查它是否存在集合中。

trans-unit.source: if value exists in the collection; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 value 存在於集合中; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 將集合複製到陣列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method is useful when you want to create a custom array to programmatically manipulate a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objects.
trans-unit.target: CopyTo 方法時，您想要建立自訂的陣列，以程式設計方式操作的一組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: 陣列<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>包含複製的集合的物件。

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示集合的內容放陣列中的起點。

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合的特定成員的位置。

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method is useful when you want to know the ordinal position (index) of one object relative to the others in a collection.
trans-unit.target: IndexOf 方法時，您想要知道的序數位置 （索引） 的一個物件相對於其他集合中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>也就是集合的成員。

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示集合中特定物件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 插入<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>集合中指定索引處的物件。

trans-unit.source: If `index` equals the number of items in the collection, then `value` is appended to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`等於然後集合中的項目數`value`附加至集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: An integer indicating the ordinal position in the collection at which a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: 一個整數，表示集合中的序數位置<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>應該插入。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>来插入至集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> objects can be added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>可以將物件加入至集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if connection objects cannot be added to the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果連接物件無法加入至集合。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a connection item within the collection, based on an index number indicating the item's location in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定連接項目在集合中，根據索引數字，指出集合中的項目的位置。

trans-unit.source: The Item property enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> collection by using an index number that represents the item's ordinal position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此項目屬性可讓您存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection>集合所代表的項目在集合中的序數位置的索引編號。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPartConnectionCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the index of a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 整數，表示集合的成員的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>集合中指定索引處。

trans-unit.source: Returns a specific member of the collection according to a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: 傳回特定成員的集合，根據唯一識別項。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object with the specified ID by performing a case-insensitive comparison.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>物件具有指定識別碼的執行不區分大小寫的比較。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the ID of a particular connection in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含在集合中的特定連線的識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The first whose ID matches the value of the id parameter.
trans-unit.target: 第一個其識別碼的值符合 id 參數。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no match is found.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找到相符項目。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref>集合中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來移除指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>集合中的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow the specified item are then moved up in the collection to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: 所有項目，請依照指定的項目會然後向上移集合中以填滿空的位置。

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 移動項目的索引也會更新。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.IList.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"></xref> to be removed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection"> </xref>移除。
